name: PartnerIdTask
friendlyName: Set Microsoft Partner ID for PAL
description: Creates or updates the Microsoft Partner ID (MPN ID) for Partner Admin Link (PAL) of the Service Principal. For usage in Bicep/ARM deployments
helpMarkDown: Task requires Azure CLI to be installed on the agent and an Azure service connection
author: Blis Digital

inputs.name: partnerId
inputs.label: Partner ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Microsoft Partner ID (MPN ID) (6-8 digits) to set for ARM deployments

validation.message: Partner ID must be a 6-8 digit number

inputs.name: azureServiceConnection
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment
